thread.title: Armory Group Expands Investment Banking Division with hire of Steven Sadek

author: cnbc.com
title: Armory Group Expands Investment Banking Division with hire of Steven Sadek

organizations.name: armory group expands investment banking division

text:
DALLAS and LOS ANGELES, March 1, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Armory Group, LLC, a leading financial advisory firm serving the middle market, is pleased to welcome Steven Sadek as Managing Director in the company's investment banking division. Based in Dallas, Steven brings more than 13 years of investment banking and financial restructuring expertise to the firm's growing middle market practice.
"Steven's addition is an exciting opportunity to expand Armory's national reach and provide additional support for our clients in the Texas and Southwest region," said Eben Perison, Head of Armory Investment Banking. "We look forward to continuing to build on our firm's successful track record of providing comprehensive financial advisory solutions to the middle market, and more importantly, delivering value to our clients."
Prior to joining Armory, Steven was a Director in the Investment Banking group at Wells Fargo Securities where he executed a broad range of transaction types, including leveraged buyout financings, public equity and high yield financings, debt and equity private placements , senior leveraged loans, and M&A advisory. Before that, he worked in the special situations and financial restructuring group at Chanin Capital Partners on transactions with debtors and creditors, including pre-crisis situations, out-of-court workouts, and Chapter 11 reorganizations.
Steven graduated from the Jerome Fisher Program in Management & Technology at the University of Pennsylvania, where he received degrees in Economics from the Wharton School and in Systems Science from the School of Engineering and Applied Science.
He can be reached at 214.563.1201 or at ssadek@armorysecurities.com .
About Armory Group, LLC
Armory Group, LLC provides comprehensive capabilities focused exclusively on the middle market, including investment banking, consulting and asset management. Our collective capabilities, combined with an award-winning team of industry experts, allows us the flexibility to deploy the right resources to best serve the situation specific needs of our clients.
